verses.verse: וְאֵ֛לֶּה <WH428> ve-'El-leh now these תֹּלְד֥וֹת <WH8435> to-le-Dot Now these [are] the generations עֵשָׂ֖ו <WH6215> 'e-Sav of Esau ה֥וּא <WH1931> hu he אֱדֽוֹם׃ <WH123> e-Dom. who [is] Edom

עֵשָׂ֛ו <WH6215> 'e-Sav Esau לָקַ֥ח <WH3947> la-Kach took אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- נָשָׁ֖יו <WH802> na-Shav his wives מִבְּנ֣וֹת <WH1323> mib-be-Not of the daughters כְּנָ֑עַן <WH3667> ke-Na-'an; of Canaan אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עָדָ֗ה <WH5711> 'a-Dah, Adah בַּת־ <WH1323> bat- the daughter אֵילוֹן֙ <WH356> 'ei-lOn of Elon הַֽחִתִּ֔י <WH2850> ha-chit-Ti, the Hittite וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et אָהֳלִֽיבָמָה֙ <WH173> 'o-ho-li-va-Mah and Aholibamah בַּת־ <WH1323> bat- the daughter עֲנָ֔ה <WH6034> 'a-Nah, of Anah בַּת־ <WH1323> bat- the daughter צִבְע֖וֹן <WH6649> tziv-'on of Zibeon הַֽחִוִּֽי׃ <WH2340> Ha-chiv-Vi. the Hivite

וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et בָּשְׂמַ֥ת <WH1315> ba-se-Mat And Bashemath בַּת־ <WH1323> bat- daughter יִשְׁמָעֵ֖אל <WH3458> yish-ma-'El Ishmael's אֲח֥וֹת <WH269> a-Chot sister נְבָיֽוֹת׃ <WH5032> ne-va-Yot. of Nebajoth

וַתֵּ֧לֶד <WH3205> vat-Te-led bare עָדָ֛ה <WH5711> 'a-Dah And Adah לְעֵשָׂ֖ו <WH6215> le-'e-Sav to Esau אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֱלִיפָ֑ז <WH464> 'e-li-Faz; Eliphaz וּבָ֣שְׂמַ֔ת <WH1315> u-Va-se-Mat, and Bashemath יָלְדָ֖ה <WH3205> Yal-dah bare אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- רְעוּאֵֽל׃ <WH7467> re-'u-'El. Reuel

וַיִּקַּ֣ח <WH3947> vai-yik-Kach took עֵשָׂ֡ו <WH6215> 'e-Sav And Esau אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- נָ֠שָׁיו <WH802> Na-shav his wives וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et בָּנָ֣יו <WH1121> ba-Nav and his sons וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et בְּנֹתָיו֮ <WH1323> be-no-Tav and his daughters וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- and all נַפְשׁ֣וֹת <WH5315> naf-Shot and all the persons בֵּיתוֹ֒ <WH1004> bei-To of his house וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et מִקְנֵ֣הוּ <WH4735> mik-Ne-hu and his cattle וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- and all בְּהֶמְתּ֗וֹ <WH929> be-hem-To, and all his beasts וְאֵת֙ <WH853> ve-'Et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- and all קִנְיָנ֔וֹ <WH7075> kin-ya-No, and all his substance אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which רָכַ֖שׁ <WH7408> ra-Chash which he had got בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> be-'E-retz in the land כְּנָ֑עַן <WH3667> ke-Na-'an; of Canaan וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <WH1980> vai-Ye-lech and went אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about אֶ֔רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz, into the country מִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> mip-pe-Nei from the face יַעֲקֹ֥ב <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko Jacob אָחִֽיו׃ <WH251> 'a-Chiv. of his brother

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for הָיָ֧ה <WH1961> ha-Yah had become רְכוּשָׁ֛ם <WH7399> re-chu-Sham For their riches רָ֖ב <WH7227> rav were more מִשֶּׁ֣בֶת <WH3427> mish-She-vet than that they might dwell יַחְדָּ֑ו <WH3162> yach-Dav; together וְלֹ֨א <WH3808> ve-Lo not יָֽכְלָ֜ה <WH3201> ya-che-Lah could אֶ֤רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz and the land מְגֽוּרֵיהֶם֙ <WH4033> me-gu-rei-Hem wherein they were strangers לָשֵׂ֣את <WH5375> la-Set not bear אֹתָ֔ם <WH853> 'o-Tam, מִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> mip-pe-Nei them because מִקְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH4735> mik-nei-Hem. of their cattle

וַיֵּ֤שֶׁב <WH3427> vai-Ye-shev Thus dwelt עֵשָׂו֙ <WH6215> 'e-Sav Esau בְּהַ֣ר <WH2022> be-Har in mount שֵׂעִ֔יר <WH8165> se-'Ir, Seir עֵשָׂ֖ו <WH6215> 'e-Sav Esau ה֥וּא <WH1931> hu he אֱדֽוֹם׃ <WH123> e-Dom. [is] Edom
